description: Manage keys for Azure SignalR Service.

commands.name: az signalr key list
commands.summary: List the access keys for a SignalR Service.
examples: az signalr key list -n MySignalR -g MyResourceGroup --query primaryKey -o tsv

commands.name: az signalr key renew
commands.summary: Regenerate the access key for a SignalR Service.
examples: az signalr key renew -n MySignalR -g MyResourceGroup --key-type secondary
